snippet.title: Far Cry 3 - Monkey Business DLC Pack Trailer
snippet.description:
Get four bonus missions and two multiplayer humiliations with Hurk and his monkeys when you pre-order Far Cry 3.

Follow Far Cry 3 at GameSpot.com!
http://www.gamespot.com/far-cry-3/
Official Site - http://far-cry.ubi.com/far-cry-3/en-us/home/index.aspx
